librariantradefinder.gui.title: Librarian Trade Finder
librariantradefinder.gui.empty-enchantme: Please join a world to load enchantments.
librariantradefinder.gui.tooltip.level: The exact level of the enchantment.
librariantradefinder.gui.tooltip.max-pri: The maximum price of the enchantment in emeralds.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.prevent: When enabled, stops the search if the tool has less than 5 durability left.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.telepor: When enabled, teleports you quickly to dropped lecterns to pick them up.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.smart_l: When enabled, automatically looks at the lectern and villager when interacting.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.slow_mo: When enabled, slowly moves the camera to look more natural.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.buy_on_: When enabled, automatically buys the enchantment when found.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.notify_: When enabled, plays a sound and sends a chat message when the enchantment is found.
librariantradefinder.gui.options.display: When enabled, shows the trades in front of the villager
